name: Swing Line
description:
NOTE : IT’S HIGHLY ADDICTIVE. DOWNLOAD AT YOUR OWN RISK.

A simple colorful minimalist 2D design arcade challenging gameplay. Guide this swinging line through endless course of matching colors.

How to play:

◆ Tap to flip the direction of this swing line.

Be careful as you need to pass through the color matching. Accept this challenge and dare to master this game.
